description:
1. Precious Only ( プレシヤス　オンリー); Comic Mujin 2007-08
Hiro has been dating his aunt Saya since the previous summer. However, he is able to visit her only during holidays when his family visits Hiro's grandmother. As such, he and Saya make the most of the short time they have together.

2. Shower Room (ミヤワ―　ルーム); Comic Mujin 2007-04
Jun is taking a shower after helping his kouhai in the track and field club, Aki, train her long jump, when Aki walks up to him, only a small towel covering her private parts, saying there is no hot water in the girls' shower room.

3. Melancholy (メランコリ); Comic Mujin 2006-12
Aya's husband has been rejecting her advances due to being busy, which makes Aya sexually frustrated. Thankfully, her husband's younger brother, Toshiaki, is currently living in their house, and his affection towards Aya is made apparent soon.

4. Necessary (ネセサリー); Comic Mujin 2006-10
Jun raped his younger sister Yumi. He has always been very close to her, but his feelings for her had slowly turned romantic, and his actions escalated. Now, he is prepared to face the consequences, but everything seems to be normal other than an awkward atmosphere between the siblings.

5. Sunao ni Narenakute (素直になれなくて); Comic Mujin 2007-02
Kurono has been in love with his senpai and the student council president, Rika, for a long time. However, when he walked into a girls' locker room while on a patrol and was caught in a compromising position by Rika a month ago, she asked him for one little favour: to do anything she asks.

6, 8. Anemone!? (アネもね⁉); Comic Mujin 2007-06, kakioroshi
When Miyuki returns home early from a night out, she catches her younger brother, Takuya, getting the head. Due to that, she has to ward off Takuya's relentless advances all the while the image stays stuck in her head.

7. Secret Mind; Comic Mujin 2006-07
Takeshi is Kazuma's childhood friend. He has noticed that his mother has been more cheerful lately, speculating that she has gotten a boyfriend. Little does he know that Kazuma is the one with the honour or that he takes every opportunity to have fun times, even when he is supposed to help Takeshi study.

tags.name: Anthology
tags.description: A collection of separate works collated into a single release.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Handjob
tags.description: Features the stimulation of genitalia by another's hands.

tags.name: MILF
tags.description: Features sexual intercourse with older women.

tags.name: Public Sex
tags.description: Features sexual acts performed in public settings.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Incest
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations between characters who are related by blood.

tags.name: Anal Sex
tags.description: Features sexual penetration of the anal cavity.

tags.name: Boobjob
tags.description: Features the stimulation of male genitalia by breasts.

tags.name: Defloration
tags.description: Features a female character who has never had sexual relations (until now).

tags.name: Fellatio
tags.description: Blowjob; features oral sex performed on male genitalia.

tags.name: Masturbation
tags.description: Features erotic stimulation of one's own genitalia or other erogenous regions.

tags.name: Nakadashi
tags.description: Creampie; features sexual ejaculation inside of a character.

tags.name: Netorare
tags.description: Netorare is what happens when the protagonist gets their partner stolen from them by someone else. It is a sexual fetish designed to cause sexual jealousy by way of having the partner indulge in sexual activity with someone other than the protagonist.

tags.name: Netori
tags.description: Features the protagonist stealing the partner of someone else. The opposite of netorare.
